dt: {bc}the part of the face above the eyes

dt.t: flames in the {wi}forehead{/wi} of the morning sky

shortdef: the part of the face above the eyes
the front or forepart of something

dt: {bc}a thermometer that is placed on, passed over, or pointed at the forehead to measure a person's body temperature

{bc}a handheld thermometer that measures the temperature of a branch of the superficial temporal artery {dx_def}see {dxt|temporal artery||2a}{/dx_def} by pointing an infrared scanner directly at the forehead or lightly passing the scanner across the skin of the forehead {bc}{sx|temporal thermometer||}

dt.t: As a precaution, all center visitors will have their temperatures taken with {wi}forehead thermometers{/wi} upon arrival, and all students will be directed to wash their hands.
They recently bought a {wi}forehead thermometer{/wi} and have tested teammates' temperatures with it three times daily.

shortdef: a thermometer that is placed on, passed over, or pointed at the forehead to measure a person's body temperature; especially : a handheld thermometer that measures the temperature of a branch of the superficial temporal artery by pointing an infrared scanner directly at the forehead or lightly passing the scanner across the skin of the forehead : temporal thermometer
